Brett Fraley

Software Developer - Lexington, KY

I'm currently a student at Awesome Inc's bootcamp in Lexington, KY. I'm looking forward to solving technical problems professionally, where I'm part of a team - doing what I love.

I also enjoy music and songwriting, building with my hands, gardening, and exploring new ideas in business and technology that make the world a better place.
